name: Asian Tiger Survival Simulator
description:
Welcome to the best tiger simulator of 2020. Discover beauty of nature! Explore breathtaking lakes and forests of Asia! Train your tiger, upgrade your skills and battle against buffalos, reindeers and mammoths, find your mate & raise a family!
You can do whatever you want in magical world of Asia!

Stunning Hd Graphics
Realistic tiger animations
Open World Simulation& RPG Experience

REALISTIC SURVIVAL SIMULATOR:
- Fight, prey and eat animals. Be the hunter not the prey!
- Hunt On Land, Jump from a tall trees or lurk up on a stone and ambush your prey!
- Prepare for epic battles with 8 different animals.

START A FAMILY:
- Find your mate , start your herd, raise your cup and hunt stronger animals with your family.

REALISTIC Day/Night Cycle:
light intensity of the sun realistically changes based on sun altitude.
Realistic stars with twinkling, moon with phases and high altitude animated cirrus clouds

Realistic Sound System:
All animals have real life sounds!

Realistic Weather:
5 Different realistic weather types with sounds: Clear Sky, Cloudy, Raining, Storm, Foggy and lightning storms.

We made this game for all fans of tiger games, simulation games and wild life survival games. Download now and become a fearless tiger!
developers: EXTREMESOFT BILISIM REKLAMCILIK TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
publishers: EXTREMESOFT BILISIM REKLAMCILIK TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
